targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  boiler_status AS "gas boiler"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  chp_status AS "chp unit"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  elctric_heater_status AS "electric heater"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  -wh03_mainmeter AS "Q_el_tot_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(-wh03_mainmeter*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_el_rod_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(wh03_mainmeter-wh02_heaterrod-wh01_heatsources) AS "Q_el_users_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Electricity consumption by users in kW

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((wh03_mainmeter-wh02_heaterrod-wh01_heatsources)*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_el_tot_usr_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total electricity used by users in kWh

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  (v01_colddrinkingwater*(t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)+v02_heatingcircuit*(t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit))*1000.0*4.2 AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((v01_colddrinkingwater*(t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)+v02_heatingcircuit*(t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit))*1000.0*4.2*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_el_src_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit+(t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler)*1000.0*4.2 AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit+(t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler)*1000.0*4.2*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  vgas01_mainmeter AS "Q_heat_hk_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(vgas01_mainmeter*10.0) AS "Q_gas_in_m3"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((((t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler+(t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit)-(v01_colddrinkingwater*(t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)+v02_heatingcircuit*(t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit)))*1000.0*4.2*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_tank_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit+(t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler)*4.2 AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit+(t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler)*1000.0*4.2 AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit+(t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler)*1000.0*4.2*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_heat_tot_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit*1000.0*4.2) AS "Q_heat_chp_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*1000.0*4.2*v03_chpunit*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_chp_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Heat produced by CHP in kWh

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler*1000.0*4.2) AS "Q_el_tot_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Heat production gas boiler in kW

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*1000.0*4.2*v04_gasboiler*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_k_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Heat produced by gas boiler in kWh

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  (v01_colddrinkingwater*(t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)+v02_heatingcircuit*(t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit))*4.2 AS "Q_el_rod_in_kW"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)*4.2*1000.0*v01_colddrinkingwater) AS "Q_el_tot_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)*4.2*v01_colddrinkingwater*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_dhw_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time_index AS "time",
  ((t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit)*4.2*1000.0*v02_heatingcircuit) AS "Q_heat_hk_in_kW"
FROM mtopeniot.etrvk
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Heat concumption heating system in kW

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum(((t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit)*4.2*1000.0*v02_heatingcircuit)) AS "Q_heat_hk_in_kWh"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  (t01_sp01+t02_sp02+t03_sp03+t04_sp04+t05_sp05+t06_sp06+t07_sp07+t08_sp08+t09_sp09+t10_sp10+t11_sp11+t12_sp12+t13_sp13+t14_sp14+t15_sp15+t16_sp16+t17_sp17+t18_sp18+t19_sp19+t20_sp20)/20.0 AS "t_avg_storage"
FROM  mtopeniot.etrvk

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time_index,$__interval),
  sum((((t28_supply_gasboiler-t29_return_gasboiler)*v04_gasboiler+(t26_supply_chpunit-t27_return_chpunit)*v03_chpunit)-(v01_colddrinkingwater*(t21_domestichotwater-t22_domesticcoldwater)+v02_heatingcircuit*(t25_supply_heatingcircuit-t24_return_heatingcircuit)))*1000.0*4.2*10.0/3600.0) AS "Q_tank_in_kWh"
